context: Do you like Robert Louis Stevenson?
I loved his story Treasure Island. I used to pretend I was in the book when I was a kid.
Wow. That's cool. I used to pretend I was a sock. When was Treasure Island written?
Great imagination!! Treasure Island was written in 1882. Maybe you should write Life as a Sock.
I tried, but I could never finish because I'd lose pages in the laundry. Is Treasure Island a real island?
resp: It is thought to be based on the island Tahiti. No wonder I ended up living here. I was really into the book.
